statements: SELECT * FROM user_login_activity;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, login_success FROM user_login_activity;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp FROM user_login_activity WHERE login_success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_login_activity ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_logins FROM user_login_activity;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp, login_success FROM user_login_activity WHERE login_success = true ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp FROM user_login_activity WHERE login_success = true ORDER BY login_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM user_login_activity WHERE user_id = 1001 AND login_success = true ORDER BY logout_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_login_activity WHERE login_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_login_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_login_activity;
SELECT user_id, username, login_time, login_location FROM user_login_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM account_security;
SELECT user_id, security_question, security_answer FROM account_security WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, login_time, login_location FROM user_login_activity ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_login_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, login_location FROM user_login_activity ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_security WHERE security_question LIKE '%mother%';
SELECT user_id, security_question, security_answer FROM account_security WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(login_time), MIN(login_time) FROM user_login_activity;
SELECT * FROM user_login_activity;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_login_activity ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, security_question FROM account_security WHERE security_answer = 'Blue';
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_login_activity WHERE user_id = 7;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_login_activity WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND password = 'securepass123';
SELECT user_id, security_question FROM account_security WHERE security_answer LIKE '%blue%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_login_activity WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_login_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING login_count > 5 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT username, last_login FROM User ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM LoginHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM FailedLoginAttempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT question_text FROM SecurityQuestions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM User ORDER BY username DESC, last_login ASC
SELECT username, last_login FROM User WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT u.username, l.login_time, l.ip_address FROM User u JOIN LoginHistory l ON u.user_id = l.user_id
SELECT u.username, q.question_text FROM User u JOIN SecurityQuestions q ON u.user_id = q.user_id WHERE q.question_text LIKE '%security%'
SELECT u.username, COUNT(a.attempt_id) AS failed_attempts FROM User u LEFT JOIN FailedLoginAttempts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING failed_attempts > 2
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_accounts ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE login_success = true;
SELECT user_id, login_ip FROM login_history WHERE login_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_accounts ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, two_factor_auth FROM account_security WHERE two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_time, login_ip FROM login_history WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
